headline.main: Now a Cardin Label Is for 2-Year-Olds

results.snippet: DARIS Pierre Cardin is now dressing 2-year-olds. There Was never any real reason why grown-up men and  women should be the only ones to wear Cardins, the designer believed, so he introduced the other day a collection of fall-winter ready-to-wear for...

byline.original: By GLORIA EMERSON Special to The New York Times

results.lead_paragraph: DARIS Pierre Cardin is now dressing 2-year-olds. There Was never any real reason why grown-up men and women should be the only ones to wear Cardins, the designer believed, so he introduced the other day a collection of fall-winter ready-to-wear for boys and girls aged 2 to 8. The clothes hung on hangers that suddenly looked huge in the silky green haute-couture salon on the Faubourg SaintHonore. Models, all under 4

results.abstract: show opened by Pres de Gaulle

headline.main: DE GAULLE OPENS AIR SHOW IN PARIS

results.snippet: PARIS, May 26 (UPI)-- President de Gaulle today opened an air show here dominated by United States-Soviet rivalry in the field of rocketry and winged aircraft.
results.lead_paragraph: PARIS, May 26 (UPI)-- President de Gaulle today opened an air show here dominated by United States-Soviet rivalry in the field of rocketry and winged aircraft.

results.abstract: I Asimov article urging US-USSR joint venture to establish colony on moon, discusses hazards and potential benefits; artist's conception of a lunar city illus

headline.main: After Apollo, A Colony on the Moon; A Colony on the Moon (Cont.)

results.snippet: THE assumption is that we (and the Russians too) will reach  the moon within a very few years. Even the tragic accidents that cost the lives of three Apollo astronauts and a Soviet cosmonaut do not alter that assumption.
results.lead_paragraph: THE assumption is that we (and the Russians too) will reach the moon within a very few years. Even the tragic accidents that cost the lives of three Apollo astronauts and a Soviet cosmonaut do not alter that assumption.
